summary: Retexture mod for all Spriggan types, including from the DLCs. Not high-resolution work, just repainting only.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][center][url=https://ibb.co/ckVyD5][img]https://preview.ibb.co/mGUEmQ/1.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
It's a retexture for all of the Spriggan types, including the DLCs. I just cleaned up the diffuse maps a tad, added some contrast to it, and sharpened some minor details. Normal maps were cleaned up, smoothed out and heightened to increase bump detail only. No real high-resolution work was done.

Diffuse maps are compressed.
Normal maps are [i]compressed.[/i]

Follows the Bethesda High Resolution Texture Pack resolution sizes. 

[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][size=3][i]- Skyrim 
- Dawnguard DLC
- Dragonborn DLC

[/i][/size][size=3][i][b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Just copy and paste into your Steam directory for your Skyrim installation.

[size=3][i][b][u]Permissions:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Credits to Bethesda Softworks for their game.

[/i][/size][/i][/size][i][i][size=3][font=Georgia][i][b]My Mods:
[/b][/i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86093/?]Dragons Resized[/url]
[size=3][i][size=3][i][size=3][i][size=3][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83328/?]Tree Faeries - Spriggan Retextures[/url][/i][/size][/i][/size]
[/i][/size][/i][/size][/font][/size][/i][/i][i][size=3][i][i][size=3][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73321/?]Seeker and Lurker - Creature Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73385/?]Storm Atronach - Creature Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69903/?]Bones and Scales - Armour Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74871/?]Reflective Vanilla Armours[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80454/?]The Decayed Dragon - Durnehviir Retex[/url][/i][/size][/i][/i][/size][/i]
